title: Examining the expression of the transcriptional repressor Zfp157 in embryonic placodes and skin
impactText: This was a small project. Finding are now being used in my laboratory for further research
findingsText: Roma is expressed in specific regions of the Hair follicle and may affect growth. Finding will form the foundation for future research and funding and also collaboration with skin specialists. Agriculture, Food and Drink,Education,Healthcare,Pharmaceuticals and Medical Biotechnology
